CustomField.description: These picklist values describe a Contact's relationship with the Program Engagement. Default values are Client, Volunteer, and Service Provider. You can edit the picklist values displayed for this field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: These picklist values describe a Contact's relationship with the Program Engagement. Default values are Client, Volunteer, and Service Provider. You can edit the picklist values displayed for this field.
CustomField.label: Role
